title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4820.47 - Advertising of bingo games
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4820.47 - Advertising of bingo games

State Regulations
A licensee may advertise the conduct of an occasion of
bingo to the general public as provided for in General Municipal Law section
490. No advertising shall include any misleading information. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4820.47

Amended

New

York State Register June 2, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 22, eff. 6/2/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
